title: THURSDAY - Battle of the undefeated teams
itunes:title: THURSDAY - Battle of the undefeated teams
description:
Week 7 of the NFL season will see a battle of the undefeated teams (0:10) as Ben Roethlisberger and the Steelers take on Derrick Henry and the Titans. It's also a big-time matchup in the NFC West (1:14) when Russell Wilson and the Seahawks take on Kyler Murray and the Cardinals. Speaking of the Seahawks, could they be adding another weapon on offense? (1:31). We have the latest update on Michael Thomas (2:55) as well as the reaction from Ryan Fitzpatrick (3:57) as he loses his starting job in Miami to Tua Tagovailoa.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
